Subject: Re: Directions for Scorp
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Scorponok emerges from the water,his armor still sparking from the damage
he sustained.  Thanks to the time his missile gave him (which is now
heading away)  he is able to quickly fire his last missilefrom his right
claw, and then makes out in a sprint towards a few boulders on the beach.
